Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. With its unique features and benefits, it's designed to make a significant difference in your life. Considering its value and the quality it brings, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $145. This price not only reflects the true worth of the product but also gives you an opportunity to experience its benefits at a special rate. I believe this investment will be well worth it for you. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
